ygData.subject: RE: Skill Caps
ygData.msgSnippet: Same way it tells if you are shooting a bow - you hit range - in our case, we could choose instruments - and cancel if we wanted to go back to our weapons. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Same way it tells if you are shooting a bow - you hit range - in our case,
we could choose instruments - and cancel if we wanted to go back to our
weapons.



At 01:51 PM 11/21/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
>how would it tell if we want to be using the instrument or weapons if we are
>holding both?
>
>Shada
>
>>
>> From: silky@...
>>
>>
>> Well, if ya send another letter, PLEASE ask them to add a
>> instrument slot
>> for us - much like folks using a bow - there is ALREADY a way for the
>> client to switch them out without having to manually juggle.
>>
>> Folks with weapons don't disarm to use a bow - casters don't
>> have to disarm
>> to cast - why do WE have to disarm to go to an instrument?
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
